long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leenker's extension exists to make it easier for you as an user to:

1. Add new Leenks to your folders and profile, in this way, you don't have to go all the way to the page (leenker.com) every time you find an interesting resource that you want to save or share.

2. Search quickly for your Leenks by using a search functionality or by filtering by one of your folders, finding a Leenk becomes even easier than finding your bookmarks. The search view will automatically detect your most clicked leenks and sort them out for you in the initial search view. Added functionality to search your local browser bookmarks without having to upload them, in this way we keep your most private items private and give you the ability to search.

3. Create and Delete folders in place when adding new leenks.
